value:
When I get married, I will never fail to
provide a delicious, homemade meal
for my husband each and every day!$k$p...$k$pNothing? OK, I'll need to say that
again. Louder.

Why am I in this gown? Like I
know! I was daydreaming about
marrying someone rich...$k$pAll of a sudden, you summoned me...
And here I am, dressed like this!

Are you tiptoeing around me just
because I'm wearing this dress?
Put me on the front lines!

You know what will set off this dress?
Flowers. Lots of flowers. Let's go find
a field, $Nu!

While I'm all dressed up, I had better
attract the attention of a wealthy
gentleman... Oopsie! I tripped!

Well, hello there! Are there any
eligible men around here you might
introduce me to? Thanks.$k$pThis dress? Oh, I'm not married...yet.

Oh, prince I have yet to meet...
I'm getting better every day!

I'll be ready for marriage...
Whenever it strikes.

If I keep this up, I'll be the last
to wed!

At this rate... I'll make a beautiful
bride. Thanks!

I'm Charlotte. Everyone says I'm just
a sweet, gentle little thing, so please
watch over me. Tee-hee!

Are you going to summon a Hero?
Oh, please! Let me come too!
C'mon, $Nu!$k$pPicture this: Someone tall and
handsome, strong yet gentle, VERY
rich...and single. My destined one!$k$pWHAT? It doesn't work that way?
What is that thing even good for,
then? Never mind.$k$pBut even without a man like that, I do
have a friend in you, don't I? Love
fades, but friendship is forever.$k$pIn other words...for now, you'll do. $k$pEnough talk! It's time for action.
Make way for the Bride of the
Battlefield!
せいっ
はあっ
ちっ…
What gives?!
Money, money!
Till death do us part!
Bridal strike!
Piece of cake!
Oh, darn.
Teehee
I must confess: this dress is the best!
What? Did you say I look pretty? Please, stop!
I'm sure you'd like to know who the lucky fellow is. Doesn't everybody?
This dress is the worst! I can't move. I can't breathe! OH! Never mind.
This spoon is as big as my love. I know. Amazing.
I look good—real good! So where are all the rich princes already?!
I think I'm a pretty good proposition. But you... You're real marriage material.
OK!
It's my time!
What bliss!
